subject: Le Mans Auto Race
Automobile Racing
PlayStation (Video Game System)
lead_paragraph: A plan to turn top video-game drivers into real race car drivers was met with skepticism, but now two drivers from PlayStation's GT Academy are proving to be respectable competitors.
snippet: A plan to turn top video-game drivers into real race car drivers was met with skepticism, but now two drivers from PlayStation's GT Academy are proving to be respectable competitors.
